definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: It is so thin that you secretly smile at it and I feel ashamed.
sentences.chinese: 这一层薄纱，薄得使你暗暗地窃笑，我感到害羞。

sentences.english: They are not shamed to display their beauty drunkenly.
sentences.chinese: 它们倒也一点不害羞，忘我的展示它们的美丽。

sentences.english: Or the bashfulness he expressed through his laugh?
sentences.chinese: 是通过他笑声中表达的害羞？

sentences.english: Hi - I have a 4-year-old who is very shy in new situations.
sentences.chinese: 岁的儿子的儿子在新环境里总是很害羞。

sentences.english: A feeling of shame came over her.
sentences.chinese: 她突然产生一种害羞的感觉。

sentences.english: Bashfulness is an enemy to poverty.
Don't constrict your breasts because of your shyness, and don't wear bra too early.
sentences.chinese: 不能因为害羞而束胸，也不能过早佩戴胸罩。
那害羞的女孩很容易发窘。

sentences.english: From “shy Mary,” she morphed into a business person and working woman.
sentences.chinese: 她从“害羞的玛丽”转变成一名商人和职业妇女。

sentences.english: Shy Shelly says she shall sew sheets.
sentences.chinese: 害羞的雪莉说她将会织被单。

sentences.english: The younger instructor stood in front of the students red with embarrassment, unable to broach the subject.
sentences.chinese: 小科代表害羞的红着脸站在全班同学面前，难以启齿。

sentences.english: As she got to know people better her shyness wore off.
sentences.chinese: 当她开始与人们熟悉起来，她就不那么害羞了。

sentences.english: Coy girls often like to play cat and mouse with Boys.
sentences.chinese: 害羞的女孩时常令男孩子捉摸不定。

sentences.english: Pandas are friendly to people, but they are very shy and kind of lazy.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫对人很友好，但他们很害羞，而且有点懒。

sentences.english: Second, you must not be shy, be thick-skinned, and speak up.
sentences.chinese: 其次，别害羞，脸皮厚一点，大声说出来。

definition: to blush/to redden (with shame, indignation etc)
affecting shyness or embarrassment/coy/mincing (walk, manner of speech)/mannered
affecting shyness or embarrassment/coy/mincing (walk, manner of speech)/mannered
fear of strangers/to be afraid of strangers (of small children)
